purpleculture_pinyin:
zào
the chirping of birds or insects; noise; clamor; buzzing; disturbance
щебетание птиц или насекомых; шум; шум; жужжание; беспокойство
purpleculture_info: Ideographic: The sound 口 of birds chirping 喿; 喿 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
噪声 [ zào shēng ]: noise
噪音 [ zào yīn ]: rumble; noise; static (in a signal)
鼓噪 [ gǔ zào ]: din
聒噪 [ guō zào ]: a clamor; noisy
名噪一时 [ míng zào yī shí ]: to achieve fame among one's contemporaries (idiom); temporary or local celebrity
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 口 [ kǒu ] mouth; entrance, gate, opening
    • 喿 [ zào ] the sound of birds chirping
heisig_chinese_memo: In this tree is a bird's most prized goods, her babies. They have their mouths open constantly chirping.
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 繰 (くる、ソウ мотать), 燥 (はしゃぐ、ソウ сушить), 操 (あやつる、ソウ управлять), 噪 (さわぐ、ソウ шуметь)
Ru_trainchinese: zào: (глаг) шуметь, галдеть; щебетать (о птицах), стрекотать (о насекомых)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: In this tree is a bird's most prized goods, her babies. They have their mouths open constantly chirping.
humanum_full_description_en:
This made " Zao ", and later by a " mouth " character, represent birds insects. Such as "Xijing Miscellaneous Notes. Third": "Dry magpies are noisy and pedestrians come, spiders gather and Pepsi is happy." Eastern Jin Xie Lingyun "Yan Ge Xing": "Autumn cicadas are noisy with willows and swallows inhabit the birds, Nian Jun will fight against the border town."

" Noise " also means noisy and noisy. Such as "Mozi. "Biography of Moths": "In the middle of the night, the city is clamoring from all sides, the enemy must be or, destroy the army and kill the general." "Lun Heng. Tiredness": "Speaking of slander, Zhenliang sees jealousy, but Gao Qi sees noise."
humanum_short_description_en: This made " Zao ", and later by a " mouth " character, represent birds, insects, noisy.
humanum_full_description:
本作「喿」，後又增一「口」字，表示鳥叫蟲鳴。如《西京雜記．第三》：「乾鵲噪而行人至，蜘蛛集而百事喜。」東晉謝靈運〈燕歌行〉：「秋蟬噪柳燕棲楹，念君行役怨邊城。」

　　「噪」也表示喧鬧、嘈雜。如《墨子．備蛾傳》：「夜半而城上四面鼓噪，敵人必或，破軍殺將。」《論衡．累害》：「以毀謗言之，貞良見妬，高奇見噪。」
humanum_short_description: 本作「喿」，後又增一「口」字，表示鳥叫蟲鳴、喧鬧。

Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: The sound 口 of birds chirping 喿; 喿 also provides the pronunciation

Chinese: In this tree is a bird's most prized goods, her babies. They have their mouths open constantly chirping.
Meaning: chirping
Hanzi: 譟
Story: In this tree is a bird's most prized goods, her babies. They have their mouths open constantly chirping.
Kind: both
本作「 喿 」，後又增一「 口 」字，表示鳥叫蟲鳴。如《西京雜記．第三》：「乾鵲噪而行人至，蜘蛛集而百事喜。」東晉謝靈運〈燕歌行〉：「秋蟬噪柳燕棲楹，念君行役怨邊城。」 「 噪 」也表示喧鬧、嘈雜。如《墨子．備蛾傳》：「夜半而城上四面鼓噪，敵人必或，破軍殺將。」《論衡．累害》：「以毀謗言之，貞良見妬，高奇見噪。」
This made " Zao", and later by a " mouth" character, represent birds insects. Such as "Xijing Miscellaneous Notes. Third": "Dry magpies are noisy and pedestrians come, spiders gather and Pepsi is happy." Eastern Jin Xie Lingyun "Yan Ge Xing": "Autumn cicadas are noisy with willows and swallows inhabit the birds, Nian Jun will fight against the border town." " Noise" also means noisy and noisy. Such as "Mozi. "Biography of Moths": "In the middle of the night, the city is clamoring from all sides, the enemy must be or, destroy the army and kill the general." "Lun Heng. Tiredness": "Speaking of slander, Zhenliang sees jealousy, but Gao Qi sees noise."

噪字的基本解释

噪
zào
许多鸟或虫子乱叫：鹊噪。蝉噪。归鸟晚噪。
声音杂乱：噪声。噪音。噪聒。
许多人大喊大叫，喧哗，鼓动：噪嚷。噪聚。声名大噪。

噪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zào］
［《廣韻》蘇到切，去号，心。］
(1)虫鸟喧叫。
(2)众口叫骂；大声喧嚷。
(3)喧闹。
(4)众口传扬。
(5)犹臊。羞辱，使难为情。

噪字的英文翻译

◎ 噪
confusion of voices, chirp

噪字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　噪； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页210第07
【廣韻】蘇到切【集韻】先到切，?音燥。【玉篇】呼噪也。【拾遺記】魯僖公有白鵶，遶煙而噪。【玉篇】同?。【廣韻】同譟。【集韻】本作喿。

考證：〔【拾遺記】魯僖公有白?遶煙而噪。〕　謹照原文白?改鵶。
噪字的源字形

噪字的起名意思

暂无。

noise
Basic explanation of words
noise
zào
Many birds or insects bark: magpie noise. Cicada noise. The homecoming bird is late.
The sound is messy: noise. noise. Noisy.
Many people yelled, clamored, agitated: noisy. Noisy. Famous.
noise
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zào］
["Guangyun" Su Daqie, Quhao, Xin. ]
(1) The noise of insects and birds.
(2) The crowd yelled; shouted loudly.
(3) Noisy.
(4) Propagate the word.
(5) Still embarrassed. Humiliated, embarrassed.
noise

◎ Noisy
confusion of voices, chirp
noise
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Moral Department] 　 Noise; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 210 to 07
[Guang Yun] Su to cut [Ji Yun] first come and cut, the sound is dry. [Jade articles] Call noise too. [Supplementary Notes] Lu Xi's public owns white catfish, which makes noise around the smoke. [Jade articles] The same?. [Guang Yun] Same noise. 【Ji Yun】This is a commentary. Textual research: [[Supplementary Notes] Lu Xi’s public has nothing to do with the smoke? 〕 　 Would you like to change it to the original text?

Шумный здо

На зовущем дереве есть три (представляющих множество) ртов (очевидно, это должен быть птичий клюв, а не человеческий рот).
«Стол» - деревянное слово, означающее «шум».
«Шуовэнь»: «Стол, поют птицы», первоначальное значение - «крик насекомых и птиц».
Ван Вэй «Вознаграждение увиденным лордам»: «В заброшенной деревне шумят птицы».

zào[c][i], диaл.[/i][/c], sào
гл.
1) zào щебетать, стрекотать; щебет, пение (птиц); стрекот; стрекочущий, щебечущий
蝉噪 стрекот цикад
群鸦乱噪 стая ворон беспорядочно каркает
鸟鹊噪 вороны каркают, сороки стрекочут
噪蛙 квакающая лягушка
2) zào, диал. также sào шуметь, галдеть, кричать; гомон, шум (голосов)
鼓噪 бить в барабан и кричать
